channel.title: Divinescape PVP (PVP Server) (Recruiting) (317)
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc453/DivineScapev1/GFX/Divinescape-PVP.png[/img] Not the legit banner ^ Im bad at GFX :\
Server Features:
Better curses added PvP System Unique donator rewards Correct weapons animation Better project insanity combat Barrage orbs Bounty hunter added Cycle event manager Removed errors according to eclipse Made some code make more sense Improved memory usage slightly Didn't pack as much into process code organized Works with Debian
Client Features: 602 animations, gfx, npcs 660 items Cache packed or compressed files Organized cache Quick Prayers Ancient magic interface with miasmics
Ill Upload media when we get a dev team :D
People Needed :
Web Designers Coders Beta Testers
Things that need to be made / Developed :
Website/Forums // Needs to be made Vote4Cash // Needs to be made Interfaces ingame Clicking Co ords // Needs to be Developed Shops // Need to be added Quest tab // Needs to be Developed
Application = Coder :
Name : Age : Skype(Needed) : Do you code Server / Client Side : Coding Experience : Activity a day :
Application = Beta
Name : Skype : Why do you wanna beta test? - Activity a day-
Application = Web designer :
Name : Age : Skype : Show some of your work : Activity a day :[/center]

item.title: Divinescape PVP (PVP Server) (Recruiting) (317)
item.dc:creator: @NieX NieX
item.description:
@NieX wrote:

Name : Anonymous ( i do not give my official name away)
Age : 16
Skype(Needed) : xyphsta
Do you code Server / Client Side : both, but my interface is weak atm… I’d perfer to code source more then client.
Coding Experience : 3 years, studying 1st year java software engineering at college atm.
Activity a day : weekdays = 1 - 4 hours… weekends = 3 - 8 hours.

EDIT: - i can do basic html… colours… textboxes… forms … etc etc :L not the best though

Read full topic

item.title: Divinescape PVP (PVP Server) (Recruiting) (317)
item.dc:creator: @MrRspsMan MrRspsMan
item.description:

okay … why ?
[/quote]
I would say,
First: This is a development team which must go here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,149.0.html
Second: I want a highly server which will go to about 400 players online
Third: I want more Old-School pking because it attract allot of people in ourdays[/quote]

This is 317 Pking server
